id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

campaignOnAir.description: Indicates if the campaign is currently active and running.

onAirReason.description: Reason for the campaign being on air or paused.

enabled.description: Indicates if the campaign is enabled or disabled.

budget.description: Information about the budget settings for the campaign.

id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign budget.

shared.description: Indicates if the budget is shared with other campaigns.

amount.description: The budget amount allocated for the campaign.

currency.description: The currency used for the budget amount.

startDate.description: The start date for the campaign budget.

endDate.description: The end date for the campaign budget.

type.description: The type of budget (e.g., daily, lifetime).

pacing.description: Information about the pacing strategy for spending the budget.

isVideo.description: Indicates if the campaign includes video content.

cpc.description: Cost per click for the campaign.

targetedSegments.description: Segments targeted by the campaign for advertising.

optimizationExperimentStatus.description: Status of any optimization experiments being conducted.

creativeFormat.description: The format of the creative used in the campaign.

metrics.description: Metrics related to the performance of the campaign.

impressions.description: Total number of impressions served by the campaign.

clicks.description: Total number of clicks received by the campaign.

spend.description: Total amount spent on the campaign.

ecpc.description: Effective cost per click for the campaign.

conversionRate.description: Rate of conversions achieved by the campaign.

cpa.description: Cost per acquisition for the campaign.

totalCpa.description: Total cost per acquisition across all campaigns.

totalSumValue.description: Total sum value across all campaigns.

sumValue.description: Sum value generated by the campaign.

viewSumValue.description: Total sum value generated from view interactions.

totalAverageValue.description: Total average value across all campaigns.

averageValue.description: Average value generated by the campaign.

viewAverageValue.description: Average value generated from view interactions.

totalRoas.description: Total return on ad spend across all campaigns.

roas.description: Return on ad spend for the campaign.

videoReachedFirstQ.description: Number of users reaching the first quartile of video content.

videoReachedSecondQ.description: Number of users reaching the second quartile of video content.

videoReachedThirdQ.description: Number of users reaching the third quartile of video content.

videoReachedCompletion.description: Number of users reaching the completion of video content.

videoViewDuration.description: Total view duration for video content.

videoAvgViewDuration.description: Average view duration for video content.

videoPlays.description: Number of plays for video content.

clicksOnVideo.description: Number of clicks specifically on video content.

videoActiveCompletions.description: Number of completions for video content.

videoActiveCompletionsPercentage.description: Percentage of completion for video content.

marketer_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketer associated with the campaign.
